definition: an overview/at a glance
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to look at/to view/to read
to cover all at one glance (idiom)/a panoramic view
be plainly visible

(last line of the poem 望岳 by Tang poet Du Fu 杜甫[Du4 Fu3]) with one look I shall see all the smaller mountains down below (from the summit of Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1])/(fig.) awe-inspiring view from a very high place

sentences.english: A few days later the weather finally cleared, revealing a completely white north face.
sentences.chinese: 数日后，天气转好，白雪皑皑的整个北壁一览无余。

sentences.english: Sure, Apple may even defeat them all.
sentences.chinese: 当然，苹果有可能一览众山小。

sentences.english: But his famous impatience is still close to thesurface.
sentences.chinese: 可是，他那著名的急脾气，仍一览无余。

sentences.english: Ask the patient for a schedule of his cancer-related events.
sentences.chinese: 要求你的病人制定好肿瘤相关事件的一览表。

sentences.english: I certainly did . The sky was very clear, and we could see for miles and miles.
sentences.chinese: 当然有，天空十分晴朗，我们可以一览无遗。

sentences.english: See world of mortals sprinkled thousand sorrow, fear the debauched heart scattered.
sentences.chinese: 一览红尘洒千愁，心虑心焦散天涯。

sentences.english: Finally a list about the great music known as death metal.
sentences.chinese: 以死亡金属著称的音乐流派终极版一览表。

sentences.english: These have been listed in a recent review .
sentences.chinese: 这些在最近的综论中已列出一览表。

sentences.english: The clues to solving them are all around, hidden in plain sight.
sentences.chinese: 解谜的线索到处都是，藏在我们能够一览无遗的地方。

sentences.english: A balcony that hangs really high, offering a great feeling of weightlessness and broad views of the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 阳台悬在高处，给人以失重和“一览众山小”的体验。

sentences.english: The window view of rooms is open, through which you can see the flourishing city.
sentences.chinese: 饭店客房窗景视野开阔，一览锡城繁华街市。

sentences.english: So, scroll down the list and then tell us how many did you already know?
sentences.chinese: 那么，向下滚动一览表，说说你知道几个吧。

sentences.english: These narrow alleyways will give you a glimpse of what Beijing used to be like.
sentences.chinese: 这些狭窄的小巷能够让你一览北京旧时风貌。

sentences.english: For a more comprehensive list, see List of emperors of the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 欲知更全面的名单，可参见《明朝皇帝一览表》。

sentences.english: The paper publish a daily list of stock exchange transaction.
sentences.chinese: 该报纸发布证券交易所每日股票买卖的一览表。

sentences.english: The following table provides a quick reference for Shell Cassida products.
sentences.chinese: 下表为壳牌加适达产品一览表。

definition: a general overview
to take in the whole scene at once/to have a panoramic view
panoramic view/wide survey
to cover all at one glance (idiom)/a panoramic view
to look at/to view/to read
to have a taste of/to realize/to appreciate
to look intensively/to feast one's eyes on
to gaze into the distance
panoramic view
to feast one's eyes on (idiom)
to look/to have a glimpse at/to observe (sth's splendor)
to get a bird's-eye view/bird's-eye view/broad overview
to overlook/to look down from a height
complete picture/full view
general situation/summary
joy of first experience (idiom)/the pleasure of reading sth for the first time
